title: League client bugged
body: My league client is bugged and keeps on trying to patch but i'm on the latest patch. It also sometimes cant connect to chat. It also doesn't log in and the launch button sometimes bugs out and doesn't work. It has been like this all of patch 6.17

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Have you attempted [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?
